article:
There have been a considerable number of small changes to the Greater London
boundary since its creation in 1965. The most significant of these were the 1969
transfers of Knockholt to Kent, and of Farleigh and Hooley to Surrey, and a
series of minor adjustments during the 1990s which realigned the boundary to the
M25 motorway in some places. The Greater London, Kent and Surrey Order,
1968
